title: 8 Nike Sneaker Deals You Don’t Want to Miss on Nordstrom Today
text:
Never underestimate the power of great sneakers. Whether you're running a 5K or running some errands in your neighborhood, a great pair of sneakers will make the time spent on your feet significantly more enjoyable.

For decades, Nike has been one of our go-to brands for shoes that are equal parts sturdy, supportive, and stylish. And if you're in the market for new kicks—or simply want to add a fresh pair of Nikes to your collection—now's a better time than any to buy. For a limited time only, Nordstrom is slashing the price of some of our favorite Nike sneakers.

While Nordstrom isn't having a big, mid-season blowout but if you do some digging, you can find plenty of great deals on Nike's popular sneakers. Whether you're on the hunt for some sneakers that will up your street style or an athlete-approved pair, you're not to find something that's worth adding to your cart.

To help kickstart your shopping spree, we're sharing 8 excellent Nike sneaker deals below. What are you waiting for? In the immortal words of Nike, just do it.
